bike.description: FACT IS-X 10m carbon front triangle, M5 rear triangle, tapered HT, replaceable ISCG mounts, 142mm dropouts, full cartridge bearing pivots, replaceable derailleur hanger, 160mm travel

components.description: Fox RP23 Adaptive Logic, Kashima coating, with Boost Valve, reb and separate climbing setting, custom 3-position open comp adj., 8.5x2.125"
1-1/8 and 1-1/2" Threadless, Campy style upper with 1-1/2" lower bearing for tapered integrated HT, cartridge bearings
Specialized Command Post BlackLite, 3 position, adjustable height w/air spring, remote operated, single bolt head 30.9mm,  S:100mm travel, M/L/XL:125mm
34.9mm clamp ID, 7050 hard anodized alloy collar, single bolt
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, reflectors, owners manual
